topic.title: Location Of Lesion Observation - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1672)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1673)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="ASSERTION" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) (CONF:1675)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1676)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1677)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.3215 Signs and Symptoms (Tularemia) DYNAMIC, where its data type is CD (CONF:1678)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] targetSiteCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.9 Body Site DYNAMIC (CONF:1679)
